name: Through the Mines
description:
Do you follow your dreams?

Saphire, a little crystal was forgotten in a big Mine, dreaming of being the greatest Crystal in the world. Help him to find the way out, collect his valueable pieces and reach the Exit of the Mines.

KeyBoard

A or D to move

SPACE to Jump

O to Interact/Open

Gamepad

LEFT ANALOGUE STICK to move  

BUTTON DOWN to Jump

BUTTON RIGHT to Interact/Open 

Credits:

Music and Sounds by EpidemicSounds
